text: Torture Garden is a 1967 British horror movie directed by Freddie Francis and was based on a series of short stories. It stars Jack Palance, Burgess Meredith, Beverly Adams, Peter Cushing, Barbara Ewing, John Standing, Bernard Kay, Maurice Denham and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1967 horror movies Category:British horror movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Freddie Francis
title: Torture Garden
